title: Financial Analyst, Finance Development Program
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job, and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: Opportunities within the FDP can include the following areas of Finance: AppleCare, Financial Services, Internet Software & Services, Marketing, Operations, R&D, Retail, Sales, Worldwide Finance Planning & Analysis, and more.
key_qualifications: We are looking for candidates with an interest in Corporate Finance or Accounting, as well as the following qualifications: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, Ability to communicate effectively with executives and business partners, Analytical mindset, Thrive in a demanding and quickly-changing environment, Be a self-starter and have a desire to learn the business, Proven track record of completing challenging projects, managing multiple priorities and deadlines, and building effective partnerships
preferred_qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Finance, Accounting, Economics, Math or related field. To express interest in any of our Finance teams, please provide a copy of your resume, cover letter and unofficial transcript.
